content: Where are we discussing about the Pectra mascot?

author: radekkapka
content: Would it be a bad idea to have 1 channel per Pectra EIP and consider it as the single source of truth? There's this channel + Telegram + consensus spec repo + ACD + HackMD (yes, I know some things get mentioned here but they quickly get lost in all the other messages) and keeping track of everything is very tiring.
